vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.1.8
§ Mithredath = "given by Mithra"
1) treasurer of king Cyrus of Persia
2) a Persian officer stationed at Samaria in the time of Artaxerxes
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   tesorero del rey Ciro; post exílico; (b)   hombre; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米提利達 这个陽性專有名詞在波斯文的意思是 "米提亞(Mithra)所賜的"
1) 波斯古列王的稅務大臣 (拉 1:8)
2) 亞達薛西年間被派於撒瑪利亞的波斯官員 (拉 4:7)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
米提利达 这个阳性专有名词在波斯文的意思是 "米提亚(Mithra)所赐的"
1) 波斯古列王的税务大臣 (拉 1:8)
2) 亚达薛西年间被派于撒玛利亚的波斯官员 (拉 4:7)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.4.7
§ Mithredath = "given by Mithra"
1) treasurer of king Cyrus of Persia
2) a Persian officer stationed at Samaria in the time of Artaxerxes
